unnormalised: अर्रे, खोनादों Tata Sons आ Companies Act, 2013 नि Section 241 खौ लानानै नोटिस मोनदों होन्ना – गोब्राब Corporate law नि खामानि, भाई! आसा खालामगोन बिथांमोनहा बेखौ 31/12 नि सिगांआव मावफुंगोन।
normalised: Arre, Tata Sons Companies Act, two thousand and thirteen ni Section two hundred and forty one ni sima notice monwbawo – gwdwi corporate law ni bathra, bhai! Asha kaalamu thirty first december simang jaow angni simang somadhan jabai.
